alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:17PM CDT until March 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Over-bank flooding is occurring in the Steens area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near flood stage at 15 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Luxapallila Creek Columbus 15.0 13.7 Thu 8 pm CDT 14.8 12.5 10.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
